post0.title: Escape From Colab
post0.content: Everyone Loves Free Stuff . Ask any budding Data Scientist what they want and, after answering coffee, you might hear the answer: . A GPU, maybe 2; actually, as many GPUs as you've got. . Sadly, not everyone has the budget to outbid the countless crypto-miners who are consistently driving up the price of anything capable of number-crunching. . . Just when all hope appears to be lost, enter Google Colaboratory, or colab for short. . Persisting Data . Saving Your Code . Exfiltrating Your Model . Conclusion .

page1.title: About Me
page1.content: I’m Jack, a Data Scientist based in London. . This is a collection of articles I’ve put together over time to document some of the things I’ve learned. .
